CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 1, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 2, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 3, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 4, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 5, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), 6, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate),null)
CustomField.label: Tad Created Date
